alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Southern Jasper (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 25 at 8:23PM CST until further notice by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Watch is extended for the following rivers in Texas... Neches River Near Evadale Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 1000 AM CST. && ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Neches River near Evadale. * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Minor flooding expected with the boat ramps at Evadale possibly becoming inaccessible. Flooding can be expected in the low-lying areas of the Lakeview community in Orange County. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CST Thursday the stage was 12.2 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached based on the latest forecast information. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Neches River Evadale 17.0 12.2 Thu 8 pm CST 14.1 15.6 16.5 &&
